channel.title: Logs on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Logs on Mark Needham

item.title: Embracing the logs
item.description: Despite the fact that I've been working full time in software for almost 8 years now every now and then I still need a reminder of how useful reading logs can be in helping solve problems. I had a couple of such instances recently which I thought I'd document. The first was a couple of weeks ago when Tim and I were pairing on moving some applications from Passenger to Unicorn and were testing whether or not we'd done so successfully.
